Title: welcome
en: Hooray, you're here! The day just got better - enjoy the following tips!

Title: text_segment
en: A section of text like this is known as a text segment. Now start rockin' your translations!

Title: tab_shortcut
en: Speedy-bi, Speedy-bo. Be fast as Speedy Gonzales. Just hit TAB to save and go to the next text segment, once you're done.

Title: statuses
en: Houston, we have no problem. Keep track of the progress of your translation by statuses at any time.

Title: status_shortcut
en:
Keep your fingers off the mouse. Master your keyboard: Change the status by using one of the shortcut keys: e.g. CTRL+K = Translated.
You can see other shortcuts at the bottom of the editor!

Title: placeholder_lingochecks
en:
We just like to see you happy, that's why LingoChecks automatically check translations for predetermined criteria.
Among other checks LingoHub verifies if {{placeholders}} used in the original text are also present in translated texts.

Title: side_panel
en: Time flies when searching for context information. In the side panel you can add more info that helps translating this text segment.

Title: comments
en: Dear developers: You are the master of translations. Add comments in a file (depends on file format) to provide translators with more information. They are imported as a description, visible in the side panel.
